IP.Name: SDADC
IP.About: SDADC: Sigma Delta Analog to Digital Converter

RefParameter.Name: FastConversionMode

Condition.Diagnostic: Fast Conversion mode can be enabled only when Regular or Injected conversion mode is Enabled

RefParameter.Description: To enable Fast Conversion Mode you must have only one regular channel with continuous mode enabled for regular conversion, or only one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected conversion, or both one regular channel and one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected and regular conversions.

RefParameter.Name: FastConversionMode

Condition.Diagnostic: Fast Conversion mode can be enabled only when Continues mode is Enabled

RefParameter.Description: To enable Fast Conversion Mode you must have only one regular channel with continuous mode enabled for regular conversion, or only one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected conversion, or both one regular channel and one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected and regular conversions.

RefParameter.Name: FastConversionMode
RefParameter.Description: To enable Fast Conversion Mode you must have only one regular channel with continuous mode enabled for regular conversion, or only one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected conversion, or both one regular channel and one injected channel with continuous mode enabled for injected and regular conversions.

PossibleValue.Diagnostic: Frequency should be less or equal to 1.5 MHz
